sentences.en: All these definitions, while sounding impressive, do not stand up under close scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 所有这些定义虽然听上去煞有其事，但都经不起推敲。

sentences.en: Bill made a scrutiny into the cause of the phenomenon.
sentences.cn: 比尔调查这现象的原因.

sentences.en: By this time she was scarcely conscious of their scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 这时她已经不觉得人家在打量她了.

sentences.en: Georgos was uncomfortable under Birdsong's scrutiny and changed the subject.
sentences.cn: 乔戈斯让伯德桑的深究搞得很不舒服就换了个话题.

sentences.en: Her argument doesn't really stand up to scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 她的观点经不起认真推敲。

sentences.en: His private life came under media scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 他的私生活受到媒体的密切关注。

sentences.en: His relationship with the KGB came under scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 他与克格勃的关系受到了审查。

sentences.en: His work looks all right, but it will not bear scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 他的工作似乎很好, 但是经不起仔细检查.

sentences.en: She subjected her face to a minute scrutiny in the clear sunlight.
sentences.cn: 她在明亮的阳光下把自己的脸仔细察看了一番.

sentences.en: The cosmological argument does not stand up under scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 宇宙成因论经不起仔细推敲.

sentences.en: The scrutiny he bent on her was most solicitous.
sentences.cn: 他弯腰仔细打量她时,那样子是最最考究的.

sentences.en: Their activities have come under police scrutiny .
sentences.cn: 他们的活动受到警方的严密监视。

sentences.en: Their arguments do not withstand the most superficial scrutiny.
sentences.cn: 他们的论据经不起一点推敲。

sentences.en: These three clubs could come under close scrutiny when their licenses come up for renewal.
sentences.cn: 要更新执照的时候，这3家夜总会可能会受到严格审查。

sentences.en: Thus, agencies may face intensive judicial scrutiny of their factual determinations.
sentences.cn: 这样, 机构就会面临对他们的事实性裁决做详尽的司法检查.

sentences.en: Your argument just won't stand up ( to close scrutiny ).
sentences.cn: 你的论点经不起 ( 仔细 ) 推敲.

words.tran_cn: 细看；仔细观察或检查；核对（等于scrutinize）

trans.tran_cn: 细看，细阅，仔细的观察，监督
trans.tran_en: careful and thorough examination of someone or something
